metadata.name: Iron Paw Gang #1
metadata.description:
Earth, 2290 AD. Animals have utilized technology to fast-forward their evolution, and are now the dominant creatures on the planet. But they no longer have to scratch for survival with tooth and claw; now they thunder into battle within giant, mechanical exosuits. In the new global order, rival factions vie for power. At the top of the pecking order sits the mighty IRON PAW GANG.

DISCLAIMER: The IRON PAW GANG Collection may feature Dynamic NFTs that can change due to owner-requested services to change certain visible characteristics of such NFTs. Changes to the IRON PAW GANG NFTs may occur without notice and may not be immediately reflected on OpenSea or any other marketplace. By purchasing, bidding, making offers, or otherwise engaging with IRON PAW GANG NFTs, you accept and assume the risk of potential changes occurring to the NFTs between purchase and receipt. Review the terms and conditions of IRONPAW.IO for more details and information.
